mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(OI.ID) FROM ORDER_ITEM OI, ITEM I WHERE OI.ITEM_ID = I.ID AND I.IS_GREEN = 'Y' AND UPDATE_AT < TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 30
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM ORDER_ITEM WHERE UPDATE_AT < TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 30

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.name AS itemName, i.id AS itemId, SUM(oi.QUANTITY) AS purchaseCount FROM item i JOIN order_item oi ON i.ID = oi.ITEM_ID JOIN orders o ON oi.ORDER_ID = o.id WHERE o.status = 'PAID' AND oi.UPDATED_AT > TRUNC(SYSDATE - 30) GROUP BY i.name, i.id ORDER BY purchaseCount DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < 11

SELECT ic.name AS categoryName, SUM(CASE WHEN i.is_green = 'N' THEN oi.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS normalItemPurchaseCount, SUM(CASE WHEN i.is_green = 'Y' THEN oi.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS ecoItemPurchaseCount FROM item i JOIN item_category ic ON i.CATEGORY_ID = ic.id JOIN order_item oi ON i.id = oi.item_id JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.id WHERE o.status = 'PAID' AND o.updated_at > SYSDATE - 30 GROUP BY ic.name ORDER BY ic.name
